Item.comments: Called from Recently visited Grid when deleted item is detected
Item.method_code:
' remove this item and all it's generations from all users "Recently Visited" list 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim itemId As String = Me.GetID() Dim itemType As String = Me.GetType() Dim itemConfigId As String = Me.getProperty("config_id","")
If itemConfigId = "" Then Return Me
Dim typeTable As String = "[" & CCO.DB.GenerateTableName(itemType) & "]"
Dim SQLstr As String = "DELETE FROM [USER_RECENTLY_VISITED_ITEM] " & _ "WHERE [USER_RECENTLY_VISITED_ITEM].item_config_id_string='" & itemConfigId & "'"
Return Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr)
Item.name: RecentlyVisited DelFrom UserList
